articles.author: Umar Shakir
articles.title: Ford needs Tesla to help it beat Tesla
articles.description: Tesla and Ford are the number one and two EV sellers, respectively, but now Ford is adopting Tesla’s NACS charging port. Both Ford CEO Jim Farley and Elon Musk see that as the future charging standard for the US.
articles.content:
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
